testsuite.name: ch.course223.advanced.domainmodels.user.unit.UserController

testcase.name: findById_requestUserById_returnsUser

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: JSON path "$.roles" Expected: [<ch.course223.advanced.domainmodels.role.Role@3920219e>] but: was a net.minidev.json.JSONArray (<[{"id":null,"name":"BASIC_USER","authorities":[{"id":null,"name":"USER_MODIFY_OWN"},{"id":null,"name":"USER_SEE_OWN"}]}]>)
